import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Input, Form, FormGroup, Label, Button, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, ModalFooter, DropdownMenu, DropdownToggle, InputGroupButtonDropdown, DropdownItem, InputGroup } from "reactstrap"; const NewNoteForm = (props) => { const [modal, setModal] = useState(false); const [dropdownOpen, setDropdownOpen] = useState(false); const toggleDropDown = () => setDropdownOpen(!dropdownOpen); const toggle = () => setModal(!modal); return (
New Note Details:
{/* Project Name {props.projectNames.map((project) => ( {project} ))} */}
); }; export default NewNoteForm;
